HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Colonists can now be assigned to squads for quick selection using the numeric keys. Additionally, there are now hotkeys for handling all colonists- selecting everyone, undrafting everyone, and sending everyone off to their defensive position. Keys can be reassigned in Options > Keyboard configuration.|Assign a new squad by selecting your colonists, holding Control and pressing a keypad number from 1 to 9.|Select all colonists belonging to a squad by pressing the key you assigned.|By pressing 0 on the keypad you can send all your colonists to their assigned defensive positions without selecting them.|The keypad period key allows you to select all colonists with one keystroke.|Press keypad divide (slash) to release all drafted colonists.|Finally, colonists will now automatically man turrets and mortars if you set their defensive position on the interaction circle of the gun. Happy defending!
- Defensive Positions is now compatible with Zetrith's Multiplayer mod.|- The shift key can now be used to queue movement orders. This can be enabled via a setting in Options > Mod Options.
